synthesis_conditions.notes: All chemicals were as purchased from the Aldrich Chemical Co. unless stated otherwise.
All chemicals were as purchased from the Aldrich Chemical Co. unless stated otherwise.

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Nickel (II) nitrate hexahydrate, 1,3,5-benzenetricarboxylic acid (btc), pyridine or 3-picoline
synthesis_conditions.notes: Crystals of L or B were afforded by diffusion of pyridine or 3-picoline vapor into a solution of nickel (II) nitrate hexahydrate and 1,3,5-benzenetricarboxylic acid in 1-butanol.
